title: Magic tablet

properties.name: description
properties.value: Magic tablets are magic spells that are cached in soft clay. This allows the spell to be used later. Clicking on the magic tablet in the inventory activates the spell and breaks the tablet.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Magic tablet
A player using a magic tablet.

Magic tablets are magic spells that are cached in soft clay. This allows the spell to be used later. Clicking on the magic tablet in the inventory activates the spell and breaks the tablet.

Contents

  • 1 Making magic tablets
  • 2 Experience
  • 3 Usage information
    • 3.1 Standard magic tablets
    • 3.2 Redirected magic tablets
    • 3.3 Arceuus teleport tablets
    • 3.4 Ancient Magicks tablets
    • 3.5 Lunar teleport tablets
    • 3.6 Other tablets
  • 4 Changes

Making magic tablets[edit | edit source]

A player creates tablets with a marble lectern.

Magic tablets are created from soft clay using a lectern in a player-owned house. A player brings the runes for the spell (elemental staves can be used) and the soft clay to the appropriate lectern in their own or another player's house. By clicking on the lectern an interface will appear showing the magic tablets that can be constructed at that lectern. After selecting a spell, the clay changes into a stackable magic tablet and the magic tablet selection window disappears.

Making magic tablets requires that the player has the appropriate Magic level.

Tablets take 4 ticks to make.

Experience[edit | edit source]

Magic experience is granted during the creation of the tablets equal to the experience granted by the normal casting of the spell. No magic experience is gained by activating the magic tablet.

Usage information[edit | edit source]

The magic tablet creation interface.

Magic tablets provide players with a method to gain the benefit of a spell before reaching the required magic level to cast it. They are also useful in situations where inventory space is critical and/or where speed of activation is useful. Players on a different spellbook (Lunar magic or Ancient Magicks) may find it useful to have access to a subset of spells from the standard spellbook.

Standard magic tablets[edit | edit source]

The table below lists all the possible magic tablets. The columns in the table represent the different type of lectern that is required to make a magic tablet. The marble lectern has the ability the create all tablets in one lectern.

The tablets that can be made on each lectern are as follows:

Redirected magic tablets[edit | edit source]

Teleport to house tablets can be redirected using scrolls of redirection to one of the player-owned house portals or to Trollheim, provided the player has a sufficient Construction level. This makes the tablet untradeable. This process can be reverted at any time. However, scrolls of redirection are not returned to the player when the process is reverted.

Based on the expected value of spending Nightmare Zone reward points on herb boxes, redirected teleport to house tablets have a value of 1,478 coins.

Level Tablet
1 Rimmington teleport
10 Taverley teleport
20 Pollnivneach teleport
25 Hosidius teleport
30 Rellekka teleport
40 Brimhaven teleport
50 Yanille teleport
70 Prifddinas teleport
1 Trollheim teleport

Arceuus teleport tablets[edit | edit source]

These teleport tablets are made at a lectern located in the Ouditor's house in Arceuus. Making these tablets require the respective runes and magic levels to create while being on the Arceuus spellbook. In addition, a dark essence block is required to substitute soft clay, which requires 100% Arceuus favour to obtain.

Level Tablet Materials Cost[n 1] GE Price Profit[n 1]
6 Arceuus library teleport 2 1 1 131 2,344 2,213
17 Draynor manor teleport 1 1 1 1 131 2,460 2,329
23 Battlefront teleport 1 1 1 1 131 2,160 2,029
28 Mind altar teleport 1 2 1 137 2,409 2,272
40 Salve graveyard teleport 1 2 1 441 2,203 1,762
48 Fenkenstrain's castle teleport 1 1 1 1 286 2,766 2,480
61 West ardougne teleport 2 2 1 572 2,833 2,261
65 Harmony island teleport 1 1 1 1 486 2,488 2,002
71 Cemetery teleport 1 1 1 1 647 2,668 2,021
83 Barrows teleport 1 2 2 1 933 3,449 2,516
90 Ape atoll teleport 2 2 2 1 1,294 3,420 2,126
  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 Assumes the appropriate rune-providing staff is used.

Ancient Magicks tablets[edit | edit source]

These teleport tablets can be made at the lectern by the altar inside the Jaldraocht Pyramid and can also be bought from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 1 point per 2 tablets. Completion of Desert Treasure is required in order to use them.

The following table shows the materials, costs, and profit made using the Pharaoh's sceptre teleport to craft them.

Level Tablet Materials Cost[n 1] GE Price Profit[n 1]
54 Paddewwa teleport 1 1 2 1 510 978 468
60 Senntisten teleport 2 1 1 665 1,442 777
66 Kharyrll teleport 1 2 1 871 1,727 856
72 Lassar teleport 4 2 1 510 1,526 1,016
78 Dareeyak teleport 2 3 2 1 510 1,416 906
84 Carrallangar teleport 2 2 1 820 1,022 202
90 Annakarl teleport 2 2 1 1,232 1,798 566
96 Ghorrock teleport 8 2 1 510 1,432 922
  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 Assumes the appropriate rune-providing staff is used.

Lunar teleport tablets[edit | edit source]

These tablets can be made at the lectern in the ceremonial building on Lunar Isle, where the ceremonial brazier can be found. Completion of Lunar Diplomacy is required in order to use some of them. This includes Moonclan teleport and Ourania teleport.

Level Tablet Materials Cost[n 1] GE Price Profit[n 1]
69 Moonclan teleport 2 2 1 1 555 1,105 550
71 Ourania teleport 6 2 1 1 555 806 251
72 Waterbirth teleport 1 2 1 1 555 1,113 558
75 Barbarian teleport 3 2 2 1 686 991 305
78 Khazard teleport 4 2 2 1 686 1,131 445
85 Fishing guild teleport 10 3 3 1 947 1,360 413
87 Catherby teleport 10 3 3 1 947 1,537 590
89 Ice plateau teleport 8 3 3 1 947 1,381 434
  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 Assumes the appropriate rune-providing staff is used.

Other tablets[edit | edit source]

These tablets are either unobtainable, limited to holiday events, or otherwise do not fit in any of the above categories.

Item GE Price
Target teleport 3,468
Deadman teleport tablet N/A
Telekinetic grab N/A
Volcanic mine teleport N/A
Wilderness crabs teleport 37,067
Wise old man's teleport tablet N/A
Scaperune teleport N/A

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 October 2020
(update)

Lunar Teleport Tablets are now tradeable on the Grand Exchange.

30 September 2020
(update | poll)

Players can now create magic tablets for Ancient Magicks and Lunar teleport spells.

30 April 2015
(update | poll)

Ancient teleport tabs and redirected house teleport tablets have been given graphical updates.

6 March 2014
(update | poll)

When making spell tablets in a player-owned house, the lectern now offers options for Make-X and Make-All.
